name: osa3
description: Helsinki University Full Stack Open part 3 phonebook backend

scripts.build:ui: rm -rf build && cd ../fullstack-tehtavat/osa2/puhelinluettelo/ && npm run build && cp -r build ../../../fullstack-tehtavat_osa3
scripts.deploy:full: npm run build:ui && git add . && git commit -m uibuild && npm run deploy
